name: 霍弘毅
objective: 教導學生閱讀囊括全球議題的文章，並藉由文章的內容作技巧的訓練，字彙的建構，語言的解析，及思維的啟發。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
Week 	Topic
1	Orientation
2	Unit One
3	Unit One 
4	Unit Two
5	Unit Two
6	Unit Three
7	Unit Three 
8	TOEIC
9	Mid-term Exam
10	Unit Four
11	Unit Four
12	Unit Five
13	Unit Five
14	Unit Six
15	Unit Six 
16	TOEIC Practice
17	Final Exam
18	Review
scorePolicy:
1. Midterm Exam: 30% 
2. Final Exam: 40%  
5. TOEIC*2: 30%
*Some material on teacher exams will come from class, not only from text book.  Therefore class attendance is highly recommended.
